# Security Policy

## üõ°Ô∏è Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of Accessify Play seriously. If you discover a security vulnerability, please help us by reporting it responsibly.

**Please do NOT post security issues in the public GitHub Issues tracker.**

Instead, please send an email directly to:
**[rafli08523717409@gmail.com]**

Please include the following details in your report:
* A description of the vulnerability.
* The steps to reproduce the issue.
* The version(s) of the addon affected.

We will do our best to respond to your report within 48 hours and will work with you to resolve the issue promptly.
